about_the_game:
It's 1865. The fires of the Civil War have died down and America is once again expanding westwards. The Wild West is a frontier where everyone lives and dies by the gun. You are the captain of a squad of government soldiers sent to bring law and order, to hunt down the bandits and robbers that plague honest folks just trying to make a living out west  - and unknowingly step into a much larger fight...

Inspired by spaghetti western classics, A Fistful of Yankees is a real-time strategy game set in the heyday of the Wild West. Lead a squad of Yankee soldiers into cinematic fights with bandits, navigate treacherous badlands, and unravel a devious plot straight out of a Western comic book!


  • The Wild West: Experience the iconic period of American history in a unique spaghetti western, with a revolver in hand and a squad of Yankees at your back.

  • Intense Tactical Gunfights: There are no duels on the lawless frontier. Find cover for your soldiers, set up chokepoints, and use clever tactics and special abilities to overcome your foes.

  • Frontier Management: You're a long way from home out west and wagon trains are few. Wisely manage your soldiers and prestige earned - or be prepared to go out like Custer.

  • Thrilling Campaign: Fighting under the Stars and Stripes will take you from arid badlands to lush Northwoods, following the trail of a cruel plot hatched by an even worse kind of robber than the usual bandits.

  • Free Battle Modes: After the campaign come many more challenges: Capture the flag, sieges, and pitched battles between all the factions in the game - including the Confederates!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelCore i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: There is only one rule in the Wild West, the rule of the gun. Lead a fistful of Yankee soldiers on a mission to bring order to this chaotic frontier, facing desperados, robber barons, and more in a spaghetti western RTS adventure like no other.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
